title: Enchanted
description: All London wants is her life back, not something easy to accomplish with her addiction to the Sidhe Touch constantly gnawing at her. This time she's found an earthborn Sidhe who just might take the edge off her craving. If she can keep the other predators like vampires and werewolves from claiming her prey, that is.  ### Genre: Urban Fantasy Length: Novella Series: Touched #3  Companion Series: Rise of the Unseelie, Champion of the Sidhe
author: S.A. Archer
